STATE v. SIMMONS. No. COA04-1042. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed April 19, 2005. Certification Date May 9, 2005. Appeal from Rowan (02CRS8888, 02CRS53424, 02CRS55616, 02CRS55729, 03CRS8069, 03CRS54928, 03CRS59686, 03CRS59857, 03CRS59860, 04CRS6).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed.
